pageContent: Objectives: To characterize the association between potency and comprehensive sexual function. The accurate assessment of sexual function is critical for the evaluation of outcomes after treatment of prostate cancer. The assessments of potency typically used in this context, however, may be oversimplified.

metaData.source:
Sexuality after treatment for early prostate cancer: exploring the meanings of "erectile dysfunction"
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11679031/
